divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving back home from church.. i was in los angeles convention center and on the exit of the freeway 110 north pico bl..i saw a round ufo.. i saw it cause the lights got my attention.. i worked at the airport so i know how air plains,, and coastguard plains look like..and the lights.. the ufo had yellow light that would go left all in a circle..i recorded it on my cell phone. and i am able to listen to sum unknown voices.. i was alone on the stree.. so thats why i called my friend that lives in Huntington park.cause i knew that he wouldnt belief me, he was able to see it as well his whole family saw it and the as well recorded on a camera.. so if u guys are interested on the video reply or give me a call we can arrange something up... and agree on a fee that its at the right price..
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around July 21st 2009
Summary: it was round yellow lights all over that would turn on and off
